ai.behavior:
when use Move to most ally
!when self has effect -Bulwark of Winter- use -Bulwark of Winter- select:self
!when self has effect -Dream of War- use -Dream of War- select:self
when 3 ability enemy use -Blizzard-
when use Move for ability -Blizzard- on enemy
when use -Hail- on strongest enemy
when use Defend
